1111311.content: now we need a scenario
1111311.title: cannon

1111311121.content:
*set before episode 1*

jackson had been having trouble at work recently, he hadn't been getting much money recently and was afraid he would lose his job

it wasn't his fault, he had been getting the morning shift when there are few people, and to make things worse it was bad weather, no one was visiting much.

"jackson i need to talk to you" rico says, jackson cringed with fear and headed to the private area behind the shack.

"jackson your preformance has been poor as of late" rico says "so we need someone new to fill your position"

"no please" jackson says getting on his knees "i will do anything to keep my job"

rico looks at jackson kneeling infront of him and thinks what could he do with this

______ rico said
1111311121.title: rico blackmails jackson

choices: yes (but he will do this more often)
no (he ahs a new job for him)
11113111212.content:
"you know" rico says "i actually believe you want this job"

jackson jumps up smiling

"wait i feel some urge to fire you coming back" rico says

jackson kneels back down
"i am moving all the want to fire you to my left foot" rico says "so all you gotta do is convince my foot to keep you employed"

"please ricos foot don't fire me i need this job" jackson beg while looking at his foot wondering what the hell he was doing

"kiss it" rico says

jackson gets on all fours and starts kissing ricos flip flopped foot

"when was the last time you washed this" jackson says

"shut up and french it up" rico says

jackson sticks his lips to ricos and began to french kiss it

"thats it kiss king ricos foot" rico says looking down at jackson

is rico going to keep him employed
11113111212.title: jackson really wants his job

choices: Sasuke is coming through the forest and finds your tiny aura.
Sasuke comes out for a stroll,because of his lack of missions.
1321112.content: It was a normal day in the leaf village when you were performing a jutsu.The jutsu was in the family,so you had to try it out to prove you were one of them when you had started you forgot the most basic part.You had forgotten to put a name in for the person you were shrinking the whole jutsu messed up,because of this.When you finished you did the dozens of hand signs and when the smoke cleared you had shrunken.When this happened you look at the scroll to see what you missed and come to find out you forgot to specify.You are in the forest when this all happened and didn't expect anyone to come through,but for your luck the jutsu lasted two days.Meanwhile...
1321112.title: Sasuke

13211122.content:
Sasuke had gotten bored of his lack of missions and figured he'd see if anything strange was happening outside of the village.
(since all that was strange inside was naruto)
He was walking casually and saw a tiny movement in the corner of his eye thinking it was a intruder he pulls out a kunai knife.When you come out it has been at least 20 minutes since the jutsu.Your all covered head to toe with muk and dirt,but you didn't care since you finally found someone to come to ask for help.
"Please help me"you say using the top of your lungs.
As Sasuke was taking this all in he wanted to get all of the information before being hasty.
"How did you get this way"asked Sasuke.
You taking deep breathes say"I messed up on my jutsu and got this way".
Sasuke started getting a big grin on his face when you said that,when you saw this you started to worry.Sasuke had a very big grin on his face.
"Sorry but a mess up's a mess up,and besides why would I do that when I could easily dominate you and make you my slave."
After he said this he followed up with,
"So do you want to start with my feet or go to my cock,and if you don't I'll just sit on you."
13211122.title: Sasuke goes out for a stroll,because of his la...

choices: The end of the tour is over
132111222.content:
You start to say ye- but then quickly make it a no as you start to run away.But as you run away,you start to notice a giant shadow looming over you as you are only 6 inches.
"So thats how it's gonna be"Sasuke says in a cocky tone.
When you had noticed the shadow you started trying to run faster but found out it was no use when Sasuke had pulled his pants down and got completely naked.He then caught up with you and slowly sat directly on you.

"Ahhh that's better",Sasuke says

While you on the other hand are smelling feces then you start to notice a rumbling.As your world shakes you are having a different reaction to this.

*FFFAAARRRTT*"How do you like that?"Sasuke begins to mock.

You were being tooken you in further into his rectum when this happened,and as you slid you began to notice that the mucated walls had gotten you hot.You began to need to breathe and started huffing and puffing.

"I actually love the smell"you say as you had been tooken in more.

"I can feel you moving around-OHH"As Sasuke said this he noticed you were turned on by it.

That's when you finally ended up reaching what is to be your end THE STOMACH
132111222.title: Disagree and run away.

1321112221.content:
When you reached your destination you plopped in some greenish-yellow solidic-liquid.

"!!!"

That's when you realized it wasn't just any ordinary liquid it was his stomach acid the large intestine had led to the smaller then finally to the stomach.You figure it'd be hopeless to cry for help this was a place that very few knew of and even fewer knew how to get out,so you wouldn't have any visitors for hopefully another 10 years if lucky and the jutsu had only been 2 hours.As you figure your end has come you sit in the liquid and wonder what will happen.NO ONE could get out even if they had tried to,so if Sasuke was lucky he would find the switch to get him out,but that wouldn't be anywhere near his time to eat,or drink.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

It had been 5 more hours and he had his conciousness somehow when you figured you were going down the shoot this time and out his rectum you just wondered why you were still concious.

"Ahhh *fart* hmm oh guess its time to use the bathroom"Sasuke had said

*Plop* *Plop* *PLOP*

"Now to get back to the village --- huh theres no exit"Sasuke say in shock

"This must be one of those prison cells you only open from the outside"Sasuke said in complete horror

"But then that means if I stay long enough I'll have to"Sasuke says as he stares at the 5 foot pile of feces
1321112221.title: DIGESTED

choices: Sasuke eats you and your remains
He dies the slow and horrible death of starvation
13211122211.content: Sasuke suffers a dire situation its been a month and no one comes to rescue him either way he could suffer or have hope.
13211122211.title: A tough choice

132111222112.content:
Sasuke takes one last look at the pile that could have saved his life and since he had been standing there looking at you and the feces he ends up having no strength to move and falls face first into the pile.

10 years later he is discovered and his humiliating ending and they figured out that the pile was the only thing to help him since the space couldn't decompose the feces being the space had nothing in it to decompose anything it was truly built so the builders could only escape.The village had found this out and arranged a funeral when they found him they found the scroll that you used and figured out what happened they then just felt sorry for the parents that you had seeing as though Sasuke had no family.
132111222112.title: He dies the slow and horrible death of starvation
